DateId.description: The Xfuze Date dim Id e.g Date_20231001

DateKey.description: The Xfuze Date Key as a number e.g 20231001

UTC.description: An Xfuze timestamp represented in UTC e.g 2023-11-06T17:12:30.780Z

DateTimeKey.description: An Xfuze timestamp represented in number format e.g 20231109135856000

DateUTC.description: An Xfuze timestamp as date represented in UTC e.g 2023-01-12

RawValue.description: An input timestamp parsed to Xfuze in raw format e.g 2023-11-06T17:12:30.780Z

Local.description: An Xfuze timestamp represented in local time e.g 2023-11-06T17:12:30.780Z+00:00

DateLocal.description: An Xfuze timestamp as date represented in local timeZone aware (if date is input not a TS is always = DateUTC ) e.g 2023-01-12

HourId.description: The Xfuze hour dim Id e.g Hours_2023110617

HourKey.description: The Xfuze hour key in number form e.g 2023110617

Millis.description: An Xfuze timestamp represented in unix Millis e.g 1673525621103

HourUTC.description: The Xfuze hour in number form e.g 17

HourLocal.description: The Xfuze hour in number form e.g 17

TimeZone.description: The related time zone offset used in local conversions e.g UTC, Europe/London

TimeZoneOffset.description: The related time zone offset used in local conversions e.g +00:00

YearMonth.description: The Xfuze YearMonth in number form e.g 202311

YearWeek.description: The Xfuze YearWeek in number form e.g 202344

YearIsoWeek.description: The Xfuze YearIsoWeek in number form e.g 202345

YearDay.description: The YearDay in number form e.g 2023310

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
